title: BaboonVR

articles.title: PCGamer: Trombone Champ looks next level with this VR mod
Eurogamer: A modder has added VR to Trombone Champ
NME: 'Trombone Champ' gets unofficial VR support with 'meme mod'

description: BaboonVR is a VR mod for Trombone Champ. A silly meme mod for a silly meme game. The game screen is shown as a projection in front of you, while you use your hands to control the trombone. The mod is still being developed, but you can gain early access with a one-time purchase on Itch.io, or by being a subscriber on Patreon.

title: HeavenVR

articles.title: Eurogamer: This new VR mod turns Neon White into the perfect 'just one more go' VR game
Real o Virtual: El frenético plataformas Neon White tendrá un mod VR este mismo mes

description: HeavenVR is a VR mod for Neon White. This fast-paced shooter/platformer fits VR really well, it's just so fun and addictive. It's a very intense VR experience. The mod is still being developed, but you can gain early access with a one-time purchase on Itch.io, or by being a subscriber on Patreon.

title: StanleyVR

articles.title: UploadVR: The Stanley Parable Is Getting A VR Mod, First Footage Revealed
Real o Virtual: The Stanley Parable también tendrá mod VR

description: StanleyVR is a VR mod for The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe. Still being polished but the full game is already playable. Full room-scale VR with motion controls.

gameLinks.title: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe on Steam

title: ShipbreakerVR
description: ShipbreakerVR is a VR mod for Hardspace: Shipbreaker. This mod is still in early development. The current version has no motion controls, but features camera-independent aiming for all the game tools.

gameLinks.title: Hardspace: Shipbreaker on PC Xbox Game Pass

title: Two Forks VR

articles.title: ‘Firewatch’ VR Support is Now Free as Unofficial Mod Goes Open Source
VRScout: Firewatch VR Mod Now Available Free Of Charge
Real o Virtual: El mod VR de Firewatch llega a su versión definitiva
UploadVR: Firewatch VR Mod Is Now Complete

description: Two Forks VR is a VR mod for Firewatch. The full game is playable in VR, with room-scale tracking, motion controls, and multiple comfort options. The mod is finished and has thus been open-sourced.

gameLinks.title: Firewatch on PC Xbox Game Pass

title: NomaiVR

articles.title: UploadVR: Outer Wilds Now Has An Incredible VR Mod
Real o Virtual: Outer Wilds está en Gamepass y se puede jugar en VR

description: NomaiVR is a VR mod for Outer Wilds. It was my first VR mod. The full game can be played in VR with room-scale tracking and motion controls.

gameLinks.title: Outer Wilds on PC Xbox Game Pass
Outer Wilds on Epic Games Store

title: ColossalVR
description: ColossalVR is a VR mod for Praey for the Gods. This is a third person game, and the VR mod keeps that perspective. A tracked VR camera with adjustments to the game UI.

gameLinks.title: Praey for the Gods on Steam

title: FatesVR
description: FatesVR is a VR mod for Return of the Obra Dinn. I provide this mod just for people who are curious about it after watching my video on the subject. It was just an experiment to see how far I could get with a VR mod for a game with such a peculiar art style.

gameLinks.title: Return of the Obra Dinn on Steam
Return of the Obra Dinn on GOG
